Accessibly App Accessibility Statement

Accessibly App is committed to making sites accessible for all, including people with disabilities. We are continuously improving the service we provide through our app to comply with increased accessibility standards, guidelines, and to make the browsing experience better for everyone.

Conformance status

The app uses the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) defined requirements to improve accessibility for people with disabilities. It defines three levels of conformance: Level A, Level AA, and Level AAA. Accessibly App is following the best guidelines and is partially conformant with WCAG 2.1 level AA.

Technical information

Accessibly App is an app supported in Shopify and Wordpress environments. The app relies on the following technologies:

HTML CSS JavaScript NodeJs MongoDB

Accessibly App features

When a site has Accessibly App i ac-h4 installed, the website can be adjusted with keyboard navigation using the “tab” key (WCAG 2.1/2.1.1). Additionally, see the list of all provided Accessibly App features and tools for better website experience:

Zoom | WCAG 2.1 / 1.4.4

This feature enables users to enhance the size of the text to up to three times the original text for better text readability.

Bigger cursor

Makes the cursor bigger and more prominent. Increases the size for better site browsing.

Invert colors

Invert the colors of the website content. For those with decreased vision, the high contrast greatly helps to read the site better.

Tweak Contrast | WCAG 2.1 / 1.4.6

This feature lets users manually select from two options: to enhance the contrast of the website or to decrease the contrast.

Tweak Brightness | WCAG 2.1 / 1.4.6

This feature lets users update the brightness on the site. The content can either be made brighter or darker.

Grayscale | WCAG 2.1 / 1.4.6

Users can turn on grayscale, making the website content appear only in shades of gray. This benefits people with visual impairment.

Reading Line

Add a supportive reading line to the site.

Readable fonts

Convert the fonts available on-site to one of the most easily readable fonts: Helvetica.

Alt Text and Images

Ability to read alt text of images. As of now, our tool has added a feature where alt descriptions for images without them are generated using [Google's Vision AI](https://cloud.google.com/vision/). In the event that you haven't manually written these image descriptions yourself, this greatly helps people with visual impairment browse your site.

Tooltips | WCAG 2.1 / 2.5.3

Add labels to images that contain a written description of the image.

Highlight links

Highlight links to make them more prominent.

Hide images

Hide images on the site. This provides better site readability for people with visual impairment.

Read page

A feature that allows a voice to read the text on your site out loud to visitors.

Notes & Feedback

We always try to update our services and operate in the best possible manner to benefit all of our clients and their site visitors.

We cannot control or correct problems with third-party sites, but please let us know if you encounter difficulty with any sites we link to so we can pass the information along to the site owners. You may also want to address your concerns directly to these third parties.

# Next-Gen Safety Meets Smart Tech: How Lucyd Eyewear’s AI-Integrated Glasses are Revolutionizing Protective Eyewear

Posted by JAY Maddox posted on November 12, 2024

![Next-Gen Safety Meets Smart Tech: How Lucyd Eyewear’s AI-Integrated Glasses are Revolutionizing Protective Eyewear](//lucyd.co/cdn/shop/articles/LS-03.24_752a1708-21da-430d-847a-c25b4943fff4.png?v=1731443806&width=64)

[Article](https://www.ien.com/new-products/safety-equipment-clothing/product/22924961/innovative-eyewear-eyewear-integrates-advanced-ai-features) from _Industrial Equipment News_

**Innovative Eyewear, Inc.** (Miami, FL), the developer of ChatGPT-enabled smart eyewear under the Lucyd, Nautica, Eddie Bauer and Reebok brands, has officially launched Lucyd Armor—the world's first smart safety eyewear in a lightweight, affordable and prescription-ready form factor and meeting the ANSI Z87.1 standard for workplace safety use. Designed for professionals in many different environments from industrial, to logistics, to medical, Lucyd Armor combines certified eye protection with advanced technology to enhance communications, information access and awareness in the workplace.

The ANSI Z87.1 standard is a safety guideline for protective eyewear, ensuring it is strong enough to shield the eyes from hazards like debris, chemicals, or dust. It tests safety glasses and goggles for impact resistance and protection in dangerous environments. The Company has also filed design and utility patents on the product.

Key Features of Lucyd Armor:

  * AI-Powered Integration: Gain instant access to Siri, Google Voice and ChatGPT for hands-free information, instructions and communication, via Bluetooth 5.3 connection.
  * All-Day Comfort and Durability: The lightweight, one-size-fits-all design features adjustable silicone nose pads and no-slip flexible temples, ensuring secure and comfortable wear during long shifts. Patent-pending touch controls enable full use of the glasses with sweaty or gloved hands.
  * Adaptive Lenses: Photochromic lenses that adapt to changing light conditions, with anti-fog and anti-scratch coatings for superior visibility, which are included at no extra cost. Additional prescription and lens upgrades can be purchased[here from Lucyd.co](https://c212.net/c/link/?t=0&l=en&o=4289256-1&h=1003483934&u=https%3A%2F%2Flucyd.co%2Fcollections%2Flucyd-armor&a=here+from+Lucyd.co).
  * 8-Hour Battery Life: Enjoy long-lasting battery with up to 8 hours of continuous music playback or 100+ hours of standby time for notifications and alerts.



[www.lucyd.co](https://c212.net/c/link/?t=0&l=en&o=4289256-1&h=2011798274&u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.lucyd.co%2F&a=www.lucyd.co)

  * [ ](//twitter.com/share?text=Next-Gen%20Safety%20Meets%20Smart%20Tech:%20How%20Lucyd%20Eyewear%E2%80%99s%20AI-Integrated%20Gl&url=https://lucyd.co/blogs/blog/next-gen-safety-meets-smart-tech-how-lucyd-eyewear-s-ai-integrated-glasses-are-revolutionizing-protective-eyewear)
  * [ ](//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https://lucyd.co/blogs/blog/next-gen-safety-meets-smart-tech-how-lucyd-eyewear-s-ai-integrated-glasses-are-revolutionizing-protective-eyewear&media=https://lucyd.co/cdn/shop/articles/LS-03.24_752a1708-21da-430d-847a-c25b4943fff4.png?crop=center&height=1024&v=1731443806&width=1024&description=Next-Gen%20Safety%20Meets%20Smart%20Tech:%20How%20Lucyd%20Eyewear%E2%80%99s%20AI-Integrated%20Gl)
  * [ ](//www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&url=https://lucyd.co/blogs/blog/next-gen-safety-meets-smart-tech-how-lucyd-eyewear-s-ai-integrated-glasses-are-revolutionizing-protective-eyewear)
  * [ ](//www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=https://lucyd.co/blogs/blog/next-gen-safety-meets-smart-tech-how-lucyd-eyewear-s-ai-integrated-glasses-are-revolutionizing-protective-eyewear)

# Introducing Lucyd Armor: The world's first smart safety glasses for all-day wear

Posted by JAY Maddox posted on October 29, 2024

![Introducing Lucyd Armor: The world's first smart safety glasses for all-day wear](//lucyd.co/cdn/shop/articles/Builder_1098-B.jpg?v=1730217421&width=64)

"Lucyd Armor is a category-defining smart safety glass that offers ANSI Z87.1-certified protection alongside instant ChatGPT access, auto-tinting lenses, a walkie-talkie VOIP feature, and a form factor similar to stylish sport wrap-around glasses. Whether working in construction, logistics, healthcare, or utility industries, professionals can benefit from protective and productivity-enhancing technologies that boost overall efficiency while allowing them to stay connected throughout the workday."

Check out the [full article](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/innovative-eyewear-launches-first-ansi-certified-smart-safety-glasses-for-all-day-wear-302289328.html?tc=eml_cleartime) from _PR Newswire._

  * [ ](//twitter.com/share?text=Introducing%20Lucyd%20Armor:%20The%20world%26%2339;s%20first%20smart%20safety%20glasses%20for%20al&url=https://lucyd.co/blogs/blog/introducing-lucyd-armor-the-worlds-first-smart-safety-glasses-for-all-day-wear)
  * [ ](//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https://lucyd.co/blogs/blog/introducing-lucyd-armor-the-worlds-first-smart-safety-glasses-for-all-day-wear&media=https://lucyd.co/cdn/shop/articles/Builder_1098-B.jpg?crop=center&height=1024&v=1730217421&width=1024&description=Introducing%20Lucyd%20Armor:%20The%20world%26%2339;s%20first%20smart%20safety%20glasses%20for%20al)
  * [ ](//www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&url=https://lucyd.co/blogs/blog/introducing-lucyd-armor-the-worlds-first-smart-safety-glasses-for-all-day-wear)

# Innovative Eyewear, Inc. Announces Notice of Patent Allowance on Modular Smart Eyewear Technology

Posted by JAY Maddox posted on October 24, 2024

![Innovative Eyewear, Inc. Announces Notice of Patent Allowance on Modular Smart Eyewear Technology](//lucyd.co/cdn/shop/articles/Innovative_Eyewear.jpg?v=1729778426&width=64)

Check out [THIS ARTICLE](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/innovative-eyewear-inc-announces-notice-of-patent-allowance-on-modular-smart-eyewear-technology-302284942.html?tc=eml_cleartime) by _PR Newswire_ that discusses patent allowance directed to smartglasses that pair or connect with other mobile devices and have removable front frames connected with a quick-disconnect hinge. This allows end users to customize their glasses after purchase with a variety of lens types and frontplate styles.

"User-interchangeable parts are a longstanding feature of popular consumer goods, and the value of this in eyewear is even greater than most products," said Harrison Gross, CEO of Innovative Eyewear.

  * [ ](//twitter.com/share?text=Innovative%20Eyewear,%20Inc.%20Announces%20Notice%20of%20Patent%20Allowance%20on%20Modul&url=https://lucyd.co/blogs/blog/innovative-eyewear-inc-announces-notice-of-patent-allowance-on-modular-smart-eyewear-technology)
  * [ ](//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https://lucyd.co/blogs/blog/innovative-eyewear-inc-announces-notice-of-patent-allowance-on-modular-smart-eyewear-technology&media=https://lucyd.co/cdn/shop/articles/Innovative_Eyewear.jpg?crop=center&height=1024&v=1729778426&width=1024&description=Innovative%20Eyewear,%20Inc.%20Announces%20Notice%20of%20Patent%20Allowance%20on%20Modul)

# Innovative Eyewear Inc. Reports First Quarter 2024 Financial Results

Posted by Harrison Gross posted on May 21, 2024

![Innovative Eyewear Inc. Reports First Quarter 2024 Financial Results](//lucyd.co/cdn/shop/articles/2A78BA01-FBFB-499B-BAA9-725C0108D5BE.jpg?v=1716308578&width=64)
